content: कलशः, --सः (शं, --सं) [केन जलेन लश-स-ति <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A pitcher, water pot, a jar, dish; स्ततौ मांसग्रथी कनककलशावित्युपमितौ <ls>Bh. 3. 20</ls>, <ls n="Bh.">1. 97</ls>; स्तनकलस <ls>Amaru. 54.</ls> °जन्मन्, °उद्भवः <ab>N.</ab> of Agastya. {@--2@} A churn. {@--3@} A kind of measure. {@--4@} A rounded pinnacle on the top of a temple.
